name: Tourism
description:
Tourism

Hi, welcome to my game for Mini-Jam 129: Poison

Tourism is a clicker where you have to visit diferent cities and spead chaos.

Controls

Play with Mouse

Reset with R

Sprites

For this game I have used some sprites from this people:

https://kenney-assets.itch.io/rpg-urban-kit from https://kenney-assets.itch.io/

Music

For this game I have used this music:

https://videoplasty.com/sound-effects/city-street-ambiance-sfx-296

https://pixabay.com/music/beats-possibly-catastrophic-144042/ from https://pixabay.com/users/alban_gogh-28413822/?utm_source=link-attributionu
